original_text: Now it came to pass in the fourteenth year of king Hezekiah, that Sennacherib king of Assyria came up against all the defenced cities of Judah, and took them.
korean_text: 히스기야 왕 십사년에 앗수르 왕 산헤립이 올라와서 유다의 모든 견고한 성을 쳐서 취하니라

sentences.original_text: in the fourteenth year of king Hezekiah
came up against all the defenced cities of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 유다의 모든 견고한 성을 쳐서 올라오매
